## Scope identifiers {#sec-fickle-horizon-scope}

```{.python #lst-scope-identifier caption="Example output for a scope identifier."}
def summarize_scope(part, book, chapter, section):
    return f"{part}.{book}.{chapter}.{section}"

summary = summarize_scope(2, 1, 2, 1)
print(f"Scope identifier: {summary}")
```

::: {.callout-tip #callout-scope-identifier title="Definition: Scope identifier"}
A <u>scope identifier</u> is the four-part label that maps a topic to its part, book, chapter, and section.
:::
